metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28949 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Archive_Tar through 1.4.10 has :// filename sanitization only to address phar attacks, and thus any other stream-wrapper attack (such as file:// to overwrite files) can still succeed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1').
